title: CuisineConnect
description: Developed Cuisine Connect, a Swiggy clone using React.js and the Swiggy API for real-time restaurant and menu data.

title: Netflix Colon
description: Developed a Netflix clone using React and the TMDb API to fetch and display movies dynamically.

title: E commerce
description: Developed an e-commerce website using React with dynamic product listings, filtering, and a responsive UI.
